alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 19 at 9:17PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * WHAT...Surfs of 11 to 14 feet, with locally higher sets, will impact south and east facing shores. * WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands. * WHEN...through Friday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 917 PO ASO LUA IULAI 19 2022 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu e 11 i le 14 futu ma e maualuluga atu i nisi o taimi, o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasae. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunu`u. * TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Faraile. * AAFIAGA...Tulaga feoloolo. O le a malolosi le fafati o galu ma`aave o le sami, e le saogalemu ai ona auau. E ono vaaia sologa i gataifale.O nisi o taimi, e iai taimi e maualuluga atu galu nai le maualuga sa fuafuaina, e ono faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti i uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faautagia nei fautuaga mo lou saogalemu.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
